History

0.1.3 (2019-02-20)
------------------

* Fixed an issue with garbage data appearing from previous transformations (with deepcopy()).

0.1.2 (2019-02-07)
------------------

* Working JSON transformation with multiple input files.

0.1.0 (2018-10-30)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
